title.value: UB-04 Point of Origin for Admission or Visit (FL-15)

description.value: NUBC Point of Origin for Admission or Visit.

copyright.value: The Official UB-04 Data Specifications Manual, copyrighted by the American Hospital Association, is the only official source of UB-04 billing information adopted by the National Uniform Billing Committee. No other publication—governmental or private/commercial—can be considered authoritative. See their website for licensing terms and conditions. As HL7 is working with the owning authority to finalize the url, this url is subject to change.
